entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 60
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
